Ramon-Luis

Hi - I'm Ramon.

I'm currently studying computer science at the University of Chicago with an emphasis on software engineering.

I've spent most of my professional career working to make technical topics in the world of financial markets easy to understand and easy to use. I'm intersted in applying similar skills to software.

I can be reached via email here.
